name: The Kherwadi Social Welfare Association

address: Kherwadi Social Welfare Association, Parishramalaya, Teen Bangla Rd

briefDescription: AT Kherwadi Social Welfare Association, we run an inclusive livelihood program  by adopting a holistic approach that enhances the skill-sets of the youth through vocational skills, guidance, counseling & financial literacy.Our flagship program, Yuva Parivartan is an inspired movement  with a desire to bring about a change for the betterment of the society.
